Tavatron growled softly under her breath. What the slag was Tigerhawk 
thinking?! That the alliance would just hand them over?! Now they had 
three prisoners! Tavatron weakly clawed at the air, she didn't like 
being lifted in such a manner, it made her feel too helpless, too 
vulnerable. Tavatron's optics narrowed to slits as her eyes fell on 
the flame thrower aimed at her face. 

*Just great* She thought with a hint of sarcasm, *I've got a flame 
thrower in my face, Iron Raptor's losing fluid, fast, and we've got a 
'bot that's seen one too many 'damsels in distress' movies trying to 
play hero. This day just gets better and better.*

Tavatron sighed inwardly, the strain of her painful tranformaiton 
finally taking it's toll on her. Her body began to go limp, her head 
partially resting against Pyro's gun. Mentally she was fine, but 
physically she was tired, beaten, and in need of some serious R&R. 
Tavatron searched the room with her eyes, finally resting her gaze on 
Iron Raptor. She was unsure of her condition, but hopefully she would 
be alright; she'd taken a pretty nasty beating from those gaurds. 
Tavatron snarled softly, why the slag had the Maximals sent Tigerhawk 
on a suicide mission? If he continued to act in such a rash manner 
he'd get them killed! The last thing she wanted was to end up as a 
pile of scrap metal!
